Description: Obsolete counter entity. You might prefer to use [game_counter](../game_counter). Counts how many times trigger_counter is triggered and displays message how many inputs are to go "Only X more to go...". After being triggered "count" times, it triggers it's target. Placement/shape/texturing of this entity does not matter as it behaves like point entity.

keyChoices.choiceDescription: If set, message of how many inputs are to go won't be displayed.

KeyDescriptions.keyDescription: Entity to trigger when the counter hits "count" value. Trigger use-type is 'Toggle'.
Entity to remove when counter hits "count" value.

Name of the [multisource](../multisource) entity that (temporary) locks this {{ entname }}. If master is specified the {{ entname }} will be disabled and won't work. When [multisource](../multisource) entity is triggered/being triggering by all possible inputs, the {{ entname }} will work again and can be triggered again to use counter. When [multisource](../multisource) lost at least one input signal, the entities becomes locked again.
How many times this entity need to be triggered to trigger it's "Target".

Issues: Most keyvalues won't work, those are inherited from volume triggers even if it's not behaving like brush entity. Don't ask me why, told you it's an obsolete entity.
